AskAIPage.overview: This AI chatbot uses the Google Gemini model to help you practice Japanese conversation. You can ask it anything, and it can respond in multiple languages.

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.intro: Welcome to our blog! By registering and using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
TermsAndConditions.acceptanceContent: By accessing and using our website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using our website's services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services.
TermsAndConditions.registrationContent: Users can register to our website using our chatbot, which is based on Gemini. By registering, you agree to provide accurate and complete information about yourself as prompted by the chatbot.
TermsAndConditions.userConductContent: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website.
TermsAndConditions.privacyPolicyContent: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your visit to our website, to understand our practices.
TermsAndConditions.changesToTermsContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
TermsAndConditions.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us.
TermsAndConditions.thankYou: Thank you for visiting our blog!

Rss.title: K-ten.jp - Live Fully in Japan, Enjoy Every Moment
Rss.description: K-ten.jp is a blog that helps you live fully in Japan, enjoy every moment. We provide you with the latest information, tips, and tricks to make your life in Japan more enjoyable.
